articles.title: New iPhone 17 lineup and iPhone Air now at Verizon: 5G power, incredible trade-in offers and savings that add up - Verizon
articles.description: Get the new iPhone 17 lineup at Verizon with incredible offers, 5G power, and a 3-year price-lock guarantee. Pre-order starts Sept 12, available Sept 19.

articles.title: Let’s compare the specs of the Apple Watch Series 11, Ultra 3, and SE 3 - The Verge
articles.description: Apple debuted the Watch Series 11, the Ultra 3, and the affordable third-gen SE. We’re breaking down their differences to help you decide which is best for you.

articles.title: watchOS 26 Adds Four New Apple Watch Faces - MacRumors
articles.description: When Apple previewed watchOS 26 in June at WWDC, the company didn't reveal any new watch faces, but now we know Apple was just holding them back...

articles.title: Spotify Is Finally Launching Lossless Audio For Premium Subscribers - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "The wait is finally over," Spotify's Gustav Gyllenhammar said in a statement Wednesday, over four years after Spotify first announced plans for a HiFi offering back in 2021.
